charitable_registration_agency: Guam Attorney General - Consumer Protection Division
exemption_threshold_note: Organizations with gross revenue under $25,000 annually may be exempt. Religious organizations exempt.

requirements.form_number: Form GRT-1 - Gross Receipts Tax Return

special_notes.pacific_territory: Guam is the westernmost U.S. territory located in Micronesia, Western Pacific.
special_notes.chamorro_culture: Indigenous Chamorro culture and language are integral to the island.
special_notes.organic_act: Governed by Organic Act of Guam (1950), providing framework for territorial government.
special_notes.gross_receipts_tax: 4% Gross Receipts Tax instead of traditional sales tax.
special_notes.strategic_location: Strategic U.S. military presence impacts local economy and governance.
special_notes.time_zone: Chamorro Standard Time (GMT+10), unique among U.S. jurisdictions.
